other_tests.findings: Positive for 2 pathogenic variants (p.P1007A and p.1077Q) of NPC1 gene.

Normal cognition, dysarthric speech, reduced vertical gaze, intact horizontal eye movements, bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, generalized myoclonic jerks, marked gait ataxia, normal abdominal examination.
Started on miglustat 100 mg oral twice daily, titrated to 200 mg oral 3 times a day.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Clinical improvement reported by 6 months to 1 year of drug use.
